Translations.Text: Tamen wen ni jingshen shi shenme? Ni shuo:“Jingshen shi wo de zhu de jimi.” Nimen zhi huode hen shao de zhishi
Ruguo wo yiyu, wo shi bi ba wo qishi ni de (“gulanjing”) xiaomie jingjin, ranhou, ni dui wo buneng faxian renhe jianhu zhe
Dan wo wei cong ni de zhu fachu de enhui er (baocun ta), ni de zhu suo shi yu ni de enhui que shi zhongda de
Ni shuo:“Ruguo renlei he jingling lianhe qilai chuangzao yi bu xiang zheyang de “gulanjing”, name, tamen jishi huxiang bangzhu, ye bi buneng chuangzao xiang zheyang de miao wen.”
Zai zhe bu “gulanjing” li, wo wei zhongren que yi shenshu ge zhong biyu, dan zhongren daban buxin
Tamen shuo:“Women jue buxin ni, zhidao ni wei women er shi yidao yuanquan cong dixia yong chu
huozhe ni youyizuo yuanpu, zhongzhizhe ye zao he pu tao, ni shi heliu guanchuan qijian
huozhe ni shi tian ru ni suo shuo di nayang, yikuai kuai di luo zai women de tou shang; huozhe ni qing zhenzhu he zhong tianshen lai (yu women) jianmian

huozhe ni you yi suo huangjin wu; huozhe ni sheng shangtian qu, women jue buxin ni que yi shengtian, zhidao ni jiang shi women yi ben women suo neng yuedu de jingdian.” Ni shuo:“Zansong wo de zhu chaojue wanwu! Wo zhishi yige ceng feng shiming de fanren.”
